name: Pharaohs Smash & Crush Puzzle Match - Free Game - Pharaoh Crusher
name_original: Pharaohs Smash & Crush Puzzle Match - Free Game - Pharaoh Crusher
description:
Match your way through more than 400 levels in this challenging and addictive puzzle adventure.

Pharaohs Smash is Fun, exciting and an entertaining puzzle match!

Exciting to play and easy to understand!

Please note: Pharaohs Smash is completely free to play but some in-game items such as change colour blocks and remove ads.

This game is suitable for the whole family and is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
-------------------------------

Join the Pharaohs in their epic adventure through a world full of mystery.

Take the journey alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

-------------------------------

Pharaohs Smash features:
● Great graphics and smooth animations that will leave you wanting more
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
● Over 400 great levels
● Leaderboards for you and your friends
● Items to unlock by completing levels

Already a fan of Pharaohs Smash? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

We are developers working hard to bring you great game apps, please write us a message regarding your experience with this app.
